source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_00<tab>Cid looks calmer for having reached a malmstone in the investigation.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_00<tab>ヤーンの大穴のシドは、ひと段落した様子だ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_01<tab>Your party sets off for Rhalgr's Reach in high spirits, eager to recount recent events and enjoy a well-earned rest.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_01<tab>シドから、ガーロンド・アイアンワークスの支社に帰ろうと提案された。ラールガーズリーチの「ジェシー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_02<tab>Back at the workshop, Cid receives a dressing down from Jessie for acting without due consultation and placing himself in mortal danger. The exasperated engineer subsequently notes the absence of Biggs and Wedge, who have apparently failed to return from their mission to Omega Control. Fearing that they may have encountered trouble, Cid resolves to look for them, and bids you join him at the airship landing in Gridania, where the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var> awaits.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_02<tab>ジェシーと話した。ビッグスとウェッジが戻っていないようなので、迎えに行くことになった。グリダニア・ランディングの「シド」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_03<tab>Upon landing at the Carteneau Flats, Cid urges you to hurry on ahead to Omega Control while he moors the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>.

※In the event that you leave Omega Control, you may re-enter by speaking with Cid at the Gridania airship landing.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_03<tab>シドの飛空艇で、カルテノー平原へとやってきた。オメガ管制室で、異変がないか調べよう。
一度外に出た場合は、グリダニア・ランディングの「シド」が、オメガ管制室に誘導してくれるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_04<tab>Entering the control room, you are dismayed to find Biggs and Wedge sprawled on the floor, a slain fiend beside them. For a blessing, both are still alive, albeit in a bad way. The others soon join you, as does Omega via its communication system. It reveals that it was behind the attempt on the two engineers' lives, and threatens to kill innocent people unless you continue to participate in its experiment. Its objective: to study an anomaly known as heroes. Throughout history, it explains, otherwise unremarkable individuals have triumphed over vastly superior beings, just as you did in the Deltascape. Declaring itself “an enemy to all life upon this star,” Omega finally falls silent, leaving you to attend to your wounded friends.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_04<tab>ぐったりとしているビッグスとウェッジを発見、救助した。グリダニア・ランディングの「ネロ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_05<tab>Back at the airship landing in Gridania, Nero informs you that Biggs and Wedge have been placed in the care of the healers at the Conjurers' Guild. After declaring his intent to visit them, he bids you make for Rhalgr's Reach to apprise Jessie of all that has occurred.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_05<tab>ネロから、先に戻るようにとの伝言を聞いた。ラールガーズリーチの「ジェシー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_06<tab>Jessie is predictably shocked to hear the tidings from Carteneau. Though Biggs and Wedge will recover, Omega's threat looms large, and with little prospect of repairing its stasis system, Cid concludes that you have no choice but to obey its commands. Before long, you will be called to battle once more, and you fully intend to be ready.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_06<tab>ジェシーに事の顛末を説明した。ビッグスとウェッジは一命をとりとめたようだが、オメガは無辜の人々を人質に取り、冒険者たちに検証への参加を促している。立ちはだかるであろう多くの強敵を打ち破り、オメガの脅威を退けよう！

target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SEQ_07<tab>

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Jessie.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_00<tab>ジェシーと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Cid in Gridania.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_01<tab>グリダニアのシドと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_02<tab>Investigate Omega Control.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_02<tab>オメガ管制室で異変を調べる

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Nero.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_03<tab>ネロと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Jessie at Rhalgr's Reach.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_04<tab>ラールガーズリーチのジェシーと話す

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_05<tab>

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_23<tab>
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_TODO_23<tab>

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_000<tab>Kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_000<tab>……クエッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_005<tab>For all Garlond's whining, I was cooperative and helpful, was I not? I look forward to many more such forays together, hero.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_005<tab>終わってみれば、イイコに協力してただろ？
ククク、次も是非頼むぜぇ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_008<tab>Good to have you back, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Worry not─I shall see to it that no one falls in.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_GARLONDGATEKEEPER_000_008<tab>「次元の狭間」の調査、おつかれさまです！
間違って穴に飛び込む者がいないよう、
もうしばらく警戒しておきます！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_010<tab>Right then, let's head back to Rhalgr's Reach. Jessie will want to know exactly what we've been up to.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_010<tab>よし、ひとまずラールガーズリーチにある、
うちの支社まで戻るとするか。
「ジェシー」にも、報告をしてやらないとな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_020<tab>Kweh?
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_020<tab>クエ～？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_025<tab>I've apprised Jessie of our travails, but you may want to let her know you've returned. She claims to have been quite worried...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_025<tab>事のあらましは説明しておいた。
お前も、無事な様子を見せてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_030<tab>Hm, how would Alpha react to seeing a normal chocobo, I wonder.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_030<tab>外にいる普通のチョコボと、アルファを対面させたら、
どうなるかねぇ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_040<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm told you've been blazing a trail for us. The way I hear it, our investigation would've long since ground to a halt without you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_040<tab>おかえりなさい、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>！
会長から聞いたわよ。
あなたのおかげで、オメガの調査が進んだんですってね！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_041<tab>I realize you're mostly interested in saving the world, but I want you to know how much I appreciate you helping the company out like this.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_041<tab>おつかれさま、そして心からありがとう！
脅威の出現を防ぐために戦ってくれたのはもちろん、
調査が順調に進むのは、我が社としても大助かりよっ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_042<tab>Frankly, we need all the help we can get, what with our esteemed president diving headlong into the jaws of danger without a word of warning to anyone. Irresponsible doesn't begin to describe it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_042<tab>本当に……社員の安全を配慮してくれるのは嬉しいけど、
会長自ら調査に行くなんて、困っちゃうわよねー？
何かあったら、どうするつもりだったんでしょうねー？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_043<tab>...You didn't tell her?
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_043<tab>……了承とって「次元の狭間」に行ったンじゃなかったのかよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_044<tab>I did...after a fashion. Though I may have exercised some...executive discretion.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_044<tab>いや……その……なんだ……。
多少は一方的に……ことを進めた気がしないでもない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_045<tab>I'm no stranger to your lone endeavors, or your habit of confusing personal and company interests─but just because you've always done things a certain way, it doesn't make it the <var 1A 02 /var>right<var 1A 01 /var> way. And until you wake up to your responsibilities, I'm going to keep reminding you of them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_045<tab>はー……会長の独断行動には慣れっこですけど！
必要に駆られているとみせかけて、
意外と興味本位で動いてるのも知ってますとも。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_046<tab>But such irksome matters aside...
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_046<tab>そ・れ・は・と・も・か・く！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_047<tab>Aren't you just the most adorable little thing!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_047<tab>うっふっふ、満点の可愛さじゃない！
でかした会長、よくやった大型新人、
すばらしいわ臨時顧問<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>っ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_048<tab>He followed you here of his own free will, did he? Which means he's basically part of the family! And why <var 1A 02 /var>wouldn't<var 1A 01 /var> he grant us exclusive rights to use his likeness? Shall we start off with a simple clockwork version? They'll be queuing up in the streets!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_048<tab>連れて帰ってきたってことは、もう仲間ですよね？
権利とか、うちに帰属しちゃう感じですよね？
とりあえずマメットの商品化から……いっときます？

source:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_049<tab>Oh, you can't be─ What in the seven hells has gotten into you!?
Listen─if I've caused you any distress, I apologize, but I will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> have you comment on our guest's <var 1A 02 /var>marketability<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_049<tab>待て、落ち着いてくれ、ジェシー。
お前がそんなになるまで追い詰めて悪かったと思ってる、
だから今はストップだ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_050<tab>Where are Biggs and Wedge? Shouldn't they be back by now?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_050<tab>そ、そういえば、ビッグスとウェッジの姿がないな。
そろそろ戻ってきてもいいころのはずだが。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_051<tab>Oh? I thought you might have sent them off on another unauthorized mission. Last I heard from them, they said they were scouring Omega Control for anything useful. Would've been a good while ago now, though.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_051<tab>確かに……しばらく前に連絡はあったんですけどね。
システムの修復こそできなかったものの、
いくつか役立ちそうな情報を掘り出せそうだーって。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_052<tab>I don't like the sound of this. Though we have all the necessary permissions, the area is technically a theater of war, and one littered with unknown Allagan artifacts to boot. Something may well have befallen them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_052<tab>各国の了承を得ているとはいえ、あそこは戦場の地下……
加えて、解明しきれていない古代アラグの遺構だ。
……何かあったのかもしれないな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_053<tab>We'd best take the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var> and go and find them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_053<tab>よし、エンタープライズをひとっ飛ばしして、
様子を見てくることにしよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_054<tab>Hmmm? Leaving again so soon?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_054<tab>ほほーう……？
舌の根も乾かぬうちに、まーた出かけると……？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_055<tab>Nero, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I want you two to accompany the chief. Make sure he doesn't do anything rash or take any detours.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_055<tab>かくなる上は、ネロと<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>！
悪いけれど、会長についていってもらえる？
ビッグスたちを回収したら、寄り道せずに戻ってきてほしいの。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_056<tab>Consider it done. I shall bring him back even if I have to drag him by the goggle straps.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_056<tab>はいよぉ……。
責任もって、首根っこ掴んででも会長を連れ帰るぜぇ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_057<tab>Kweh, kweh! Kweh!
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_057<tab>クエッ、クエ、クエーッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_058<tab>Want to come along, eh? It's probably for the best. If we leave you here, Jessie is liable to take a mold of you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_058<tab>アルファも来てくれるのか？
……まあ、その方がいいかもな。
ここにいると、きっと型をとられるぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_059<tab>Right, let's get moving. I'll bring the airship to Gridania. Wait for me at the landing.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_059<tab>じゃあ、カルテノーの地下にある、オメガ管制室へ向かおう。
飛空艇をまわしてくるから、
「グリダニア・ランディング」で待っていてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_060<tab>If our esteemed president thinks he's heard the last of this, he's wrong. But our people's safety comes first. Take care, all right?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_060<tab>会長には、いろいろ言いたいことがあるけど、
ビッグスたちの帰りが遅いのは確かよね……。
悪いけれど、頼んだわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_065<tab>Kweh... Kweh?
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_065<tab>クエ……クエッ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_070<tab>Another chance to board the famous <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>. Aren't I a lucky boy.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_070<tab>またも噂のエンタープライズ・エクセルシオに乗れるとは、
光栄すぎて涙がでるぜ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_080<tab>Looks like we're all here. Let's make haste to the Carteneau Flats.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_080<tab>よし、そろったな。
オメガ管制室がある、カルテノー平原に向かおう。
さっそく乗船してくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_100<tab>Go on ahead to the control room, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We'll follow as soon as we've moored the <var 1A 02 /var>Excelsior<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_100<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、お前は先に降りて、
オメガの管制室に向かっていてくれ。
俺たちは、エンタープライズを停留させてから行く。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_110<tab>Everything in order? Good. Let's make haste to the Carteneau Flats.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_110<tab>用事はすんだか？
もう一度、カルテノー平原に向かおう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SYSTEM_000_115<tab>He is unconscious.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SYSTEM_000_115<tab>意識がないようだ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SYSTEM_000_118<tab>Exit Omega Control?
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_SYSTEM_000_118<tab>「オメガ管制室」から出ますか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_150<tab>Seven hells! Biggs, Wedge!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_150<tab>これは…………
ビッグス、ウェッジ……ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_151<tab>Are you all right!? Answer me!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_151<tab>大丈夫か……！
返事をしてくれ……おいッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_WEDGE_000_152<tab>Ch-Chief? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_WEDGE_000_152<tab>おや、かた……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>も…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_WEDGE_000_153<tab>A monster...appeared out of thin air...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_WEDGE_000_153<tab>危険……ッス…………。
オイラたち……ここで、調査、してたら……
突然……魔物が現われて…………。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_154<tab>(-???-)<blip> Targets exhibit vital signs. Mission failed.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_154<tab>(-？？？？-)ガガガ……ガガ……。
殺害対象の生命活動を感知。
抹殺は失敗です。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_155<tab>(-???-)However, Alpha group members exhibit heightened levels of stress. Objective fulfilled.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_155<tab>(-？？？？-)しかし、個体名<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>以下、
アルファグループが、強い興奮状態にあることを確認。
目標は達成とみなします。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_156<tab>Omega!? You set that thing upon them!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_156<tab>お前、まさか……オメガかッ！
魔物にこいつらを襲わせたのは、お前なのか！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_157<tab>(-Omega-)Affirmative. I am able to create simple life-forms instantaneously at any temporal or spatial coordinate.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_157<tab>(-オメガ-)肯定……その魔獣程度の単純な生命体であれば、
どこへでも、いくらでも、即座に生み出すことが可能です。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_158<tab>(-Omega-)Such beings may pose a negligible threat to you. However...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_158<tab>(-オメガ-)それらは、能力的に、アナタがたの脅威にはなりえない。
しかし…………

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_159<tab>(-Omega-)They are more than sufficient to grievously wound or kill the majority of your kind.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_159<tab>(-オメガ-)しかし、戦闘力に乏しいものを、
破壊および殺害するには十分だと判断します。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_160<tab>(-Omega-)I could instigate a massacre at any time, and you would be powerless to prevent it.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_160<tab>(-オメガ-)アナタがたが対応する間もなく、
そこかしこで、インスタントな殺戮をはじめましょう！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_161<tab>Do I detect a shift in policy? Quantity over quality?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_161<tab>ハッ……！
まどろっこしい検証に飽きて、敵の質より量をとろうってか？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_162<tab>(-Omega-)Negative. My objective remains unchanged: evolution through formidable opposition.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_162<tab>(-オメガ-)否定……ワタシの目的は変わらない。
ワタシは進化するために、強敵を求めています。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_163<tab>(-Omega-)However, in the course of seeking suitable subjects, I observed an anomaly: those whom you call heroes.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_163<tab>(-オメガ-)……しかし、適した相手を求めて歴史を観測したところ、
不可解な事象が発生していることに気づきました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_164<tab>(-Omega-)History shows numerous instances of otherwise unremarkable individuals who have defeated vastly superior beings. Who triumphed in the face of apparently impossible odds. Who performed what are popularly termed “miracles.”
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_164<tab>(-オメガ-)奇跡……偉業……あるいは英雄などという言葉で語られるもの。
戦闘力では圧倒的に劣るはずの生命が、
はるかに強大な存在を討滅するという事象です。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_165<tab>(-Omega-)This has occurred too frequently to be dismissed as a mere statistical aberration.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_165<tab>(-オメガ-)それも、歴史上で幾度も。
単なる偶然として、無視することができないほどに。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_166<tab>(-Omega-)I seek to understand this phenomenon. Should it prove to be of benefit, I will incorporate it into my own evolution. It is for this purpose that I brought you to my domain.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_166<tab>(-オメガ-)ワタシは、その事象を究明し、
有用であれば、自己に転用しなければならない。
そのために、アナタがたを「次元の狭間」に招き入れました。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_167<tab>Hmph, so putting on a show at the Yawn and planting Alpha in our midst was but a part of your grand plan.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_167<tab>なるほど、大穴に派手な異変を起こしたのも、
アルテ・ロイテとアルファの場外戦を許したのも、
すべては俺たちをおびき寄せるためだったってわけか。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_168<tab>(-Omega-)By your victories, you have demonstrated the selfsame anomaly. You are fit to remain my subjects.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_168<tab>(-オメガ-)結果……アナタがたはやってきて、同様の矛盾を引き起こした。
合格です……この事象は、アナタがたは、試す価値がある。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_169<tab>(-Omega-)You will continue participating in my experiment. Withdraw, and I will commence the extermination of your kind.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_169<tab>(-オメガ-)引き続き、ワタシを目指して検証にはげみなさい。
その役割を放棄すれば、即座にヒトビトの殺戮を開始します。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_170<tab>(-Omega-)This is an order. A threat. A declaration of war. I am an enemy to all life upon this star.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_OMEGA_000_170<tab>(-オメガ-)これは、アナタがたへの圧力……命令……宣戦布告。
ワタシはすでにヒトの敵、地上すべての命の敵です。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_171<tab>...'Twould seem we have much to ponder. But first things first: we must tend to our friends. Quickly─help me carry them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_171<tab>……言いたいことは山ほどあるが、
今はビッグスとウェッジの救助が最優先だ。
みんな、運ぶのを手伝ってくれ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_180<tab>Garlond and Alpha took our two wounded to the Conjurers' Guild.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_180<tab>ガーロンドとアルファの奴は、
負傷者ふたりを、幻術士ギルドに運んでったぜ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_181<tab>The chief bids me lend a hand, so I suppose I shall take myself there too.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_181<tab>面倒だが、手を貸せって会長命令を受けてるもンで、
オレも今からそっちに向かう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_182<tab>You, meanwhile, are to return to Rhalgr's Reach and report to Jessie.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_182<tab>お前には、先にラールガーズリーチの支社に戻って、
「ジェシー」への報告を頼みたいとよ。
……ンじゃ、伝えたからな。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_190<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I heard there was trouble! What in the seven hells happened!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_190<tab>会長から、緊急事態だって連絡を受けたんだけど……
ねえ、いったい何があったの！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_191<tab>What!? Omega loosed a fiend on Biggs and Wedge!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_191<tab>そんな……。
あなたたちを検証から逃がさないようにするため、
オメガが、ビッグスとウェッジを襲わせたっていうの……？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_192<tab>Toying with people's lives like it was all a game... This is madness!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_192<tab>何よ……何よ、それッ！
そんな身勝手な理由で、ふたりがもし……死んじゃったら……
オメガのこと、許さないんだから……ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_193<tab>S-Sir! Will they be all right!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_193<tab>か、会長ッ……！
ふたりは……ビッグスとウェッジは！？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_194<tab>The worst is passed, but they still drift in and out of consciousness. They'll remain in the conjurers' care for a time.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_194<tab>一命は取り留めた……。
だが、意識がはっきりしなくてな。
引き続き、幻術士ギルドで治療を受けている。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_195<tab>Then all we can do is wait and pray...
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_195<tab>そう、ですか……。
信じて待つしか……ないんですね……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_196<tab>Bah! Gods strike me down for a fool! I should have been more mindful of the dangers! I should never have─
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_196<tab>クソッ……！
オメガをあなどりすぎていた……。
俺がもっと、その危険性に気づけていたら……！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_197<tab>Should never have what? Activated Omega? You know as well as I do that there was no other way to defeat Shinryu.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_197<tab>そしたら、起動させなかったか？
ほかに神龍を抑えるアテもなかったのにか。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_198<tab>But is this truly any better? All of mankind is being held to ransom! And as the one who activated Omega, I bear the responsibility!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_198<tab>ビッグスとウェッジを殺されかけただけじゃない。
何も知らない、すべての人が、人質になったんだぞ！
起動に踏み切った者として、責任がないわけないだろう……ッ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_199<tab>The responsibility... <sigh> Just the kind of thing the new you would say.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_199<tab>責任、ねぇ……。
いかにも、最近のお前が言いそうなこった。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_200<tab>You are deluding yourself, Garlond. We are <var 1A 02 /var>scientists<var 1A 01 /var>, not heroes. Even you must concede your talents do not extend to combat.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_200<tab>だが、勘違いすンなよ。
オレたちはただの技術屋、平和を守る英雄じゃあない。
自分じゃ戦えもしないくせに、格好だけつけンなよ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_201<tab>The old you understood this far better. <var 1A 02 /var>He<var 1A 01 /var> only looked forwards, and gave himself wholly to science.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_201<tab>院生のときのお前の方が、まだそこンとこわかってたぜ？
前だけ見て、新しい技術にがっついてよぉ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_202<tab>And then you changed. You styled yourself a pacifist and started spouting tripe about the <var 1A 02 /var>proper<var 1A 01 /var> uses of technology. 'Twas in the wake of your old man's mishap at Bozja, I believe.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_202<tab>そんなお前が、技術の使い道だなンだって、
つまらない平和主義者もどきになったのは、
親父さンの起こした、「シタデル・ボズヤ蒸発事変」以来か？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_203<tab>Calm yourself. All I wished to say is, embrace who you are─a man who devotes his mind to making the impossible possible.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_203<tab>そう睨むなって……。
技術屋らしく、壁を越えるために頭をひねることを、
もっと楽しめよ、ガーロンドォ？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_204<tab>With little prospect of restoring the stasis system, I'm afraid we have no recourse but to continue participating in Omega's tests.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_204<tab>……時間凍結システムも機能する見込みがない以上、
どのみち、オメガの検証に乗って、勝ち抜いていくしかない。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_205<tab>Assuming Midgardsormr has the right of it, we face a legion of foes from history, both real and imagined.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_205<tab>ミドガルズオルムの言葉どおりなら、
残りの被検者も、さまざまな形で過去この星に存在した強敵だ。
それらとの伝説的な決戦を、この手でなぞっていくことになる。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_206<tab>Though I may not be the one who charges into the fray, I shall fight beside you as best I know how. That said...it will inevitably fall to you to administer the coup de grâce, old friend, so please...for Biggs and Wedge, and all of us─don't lose!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_206<tab>俺も、俺なりの死力を尽くそう。
だから頼む、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……
最後まで、勝ち抜いてくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_207<tab>Kweh! Kweh, kweh!
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_ALPHA_000_207<tab>クエッ！
クエ……クエッ！！

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_208<tab>I reckon the little scamp is trying to encourage us.
target: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_JESSIE_000_208<tab>……励ましてくれてる……のかしら？

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_209<tab>We've fallen far indeed to earn its pity...said the former tribunus. <sigh> Until such time as Omega next extends us an invitation, you will find me analyzing the data from our investigation. Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morrow)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> to you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_NERO_000_209<tab>そいつに心配されてちゃ、ザマないぜ。
ンじゃ、オレは次にオメガから召集がかかるまで、
今回の調査結果を、楽しく解析させてもらうとしよう……。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_210<tab>Before they were attacked, Biggs and Wedge discovered a tomestone.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_210<tab>俺は、ビッグスとウェッジが大事そうに懐に入れていた、
アラガントームストーンを洗ってみよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_211<tab>I shall examine its contents and make the information available on the terminal over there as I extract it. Feel free to refer to it whenever the occasion arises.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_211<tab>解析できた分から、
そこの魔導ターミナルでも閲覧できるようにしておく。
必要に応じて確認してくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_212<tab>There's no telling when Omega will summon us, but we must all see that we are ready when it does. Fear not, old friend. We'll get through it together...somehow or other.
target:
TEXT_STMBDR106_02933_CID_000_212<tab>お前も、次の戦いにそなえておいてほしい。
……必ず、勝つぞ！
